headline.main: De Gaulle Calls on Weygand's Armies To Join 'Free French' in 'Conquest of Libya'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 31 -- The "Free French" commander, General Charles de Gaulle, called today upon the unbeaten French armies under General Maxime Weygand in North and West Africa to throw off their "shameful" inertia and help "complete the conquest of Italian Libya."
abstract: Gen de Gaulle urges Gen Weygand forces to join Free French forces in Libya, radio s
